response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $10,000 to both you and myself. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit your endeavors. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I propose a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent value, allowing you to acquire the product at a discount while securing its benefits. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to contribute to your success with this remarkable item.", "product_price": 9500}
